author: Pablo Ruiz Picasso
desc: Pablo Picasso was the most dominant and influential artist of the first half of the 20th century. He was born in Malaga, Spain，but spent most of his adult life in France. Associated most of all with pioneering Cubism, alongside Georges Braque, he also invented collage and made major contributions to Symbolism and Surrealism. He saw himself above all as a painter, yet his sculpture was greatly influential, and he also explored areas as diverse as printmaking and ceramics. In addition to that, Picasso was also a ceramicist, stage designer, poet and playwright.
cdesc: 巴勃罗·毕加索(Pablo Picasso)是20世纪上半叶最具影响力的艺术家。他出生于西班牙马拉加，但成年后的大部分时间都居住在法国。他与开拓性的立体主义联系在一起，与乔治·布拉克一起发明了拼贴画，并对象征主义和超现实主义做出了重大贡献。毕加索认为，自己首先是一名画家，但同时他对雕塑有深远的影响，他还探索了从版画到陶瓷的各种艺术领域。 除此之外，毕加索还是一位陶艺家、舞台设计师、诗人和剧作家。

author: BEEPLE
desc: Beeple, real name Mick Winkelmann and hailing from South Carolina, is a graphic designer and dynamic artist, not only famous in the world of online culture, but also the hottest new name in NFT art. His NFT work "Everydays: The First 5000 Days" fetched a record-breaking $69.3 million at a Christie's online auction. According to public data, Beeple is currently the most valuable artist in NFT art, with total artwork value more than $140 million (900 million RMB).
cdesc: Beeple本名Mick Winkelmann，来自美国南卡罗莱纳州，平面设计师兼动态艺术家，不仅在网络文化圈大名鼎鼎，更是NFT艺术品最为炙手可热的新贵。2021年3月13日，Beeple的NFT作品《Everydays：THE FIRST 5000 DAYS》以6930万美元在佳士得加密艺术拍卖中创下记录。据公开数据显示，Beeple是目前NFT艺术领域身价最高的艺术家，超过1.4亿美元（9亿人民币）。

author: Andy Warhol
desc: Andy Warhol was an American artist, film director, and producer who was a leading figure in the visual art movement known as pop art. He ventured into a wide variety of art forms, including performance art, filmmaking, video installations and writing, and controversially blurred the lines between fine art and mainstream aesthetics.
cdesc: 著名美国艺术家、电影导演和制片人，被称为波普艺术的视觉艺术运动的领军人物。他涉足了各种各样的艺术形式，包括行为艺术、电影制作、视频装置和写作，他在充满争议的背景下突破了美术和主流美学之间的界限。

author: Pak
desc: Pak is an artist at the forefront of digital art and crypto media. An anonymous creator, Pak has been active in the world of digital art for over two decades, leveraging evolving technology to create boundary-pushing artwork. He is the founder and lead designer of the studio Undream and creator of Archillect. In the burgeoning NFT space, Pak has established hisself as a leader of striking artwork, novel token mechanisms, and evolving media.
cdesc: Pak是游走在数字艺术和密码媒介前沿的艺术家。作为一名匿名的创作者，Pak在数字艺术界活跃了20多年，利用不断发展的技术来创作突破边界的艺术品。他是UnDream工作室的创始人和首席设计师，也是Archillect的创建者。凭借引人注目的艺术品、新颖的机制和不断发展的媒介材料，Pak已经在蓬勃发展的NFT领域确立了自己作为领导者的地位。
